Package com.pathfinder.racetrack.model

Class Car

java.lang.Object
com.pathfinder.racetrack.model.Car
public class Car
extends Object
This class represents a car in the game

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Car​(int x, int y, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
    Create an instance of the car with specified a position and color
    Car​(javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
    Create an instance of the car with position (0,0) and a specified color

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    javafx.scene.paint.Color getColor()
    Get the color of the car
    Velocity getCurrentVelocity()
    Get the current velocity of the car
    Coordinate getLastPosition()
    Get the previous position of the car, if one exists, otherwise it will return the current position.

    Get the highest reached speed of the car

    Calculates the next base point by vector addition.

    Get the value if the car has crashed

    • Car

      Create an instance of the car with position (0,0) and a specified color
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the car

    • Car

      public Car​(int x, int y, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Create an instance of the car with specified a position and color
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the car
      x - x-axis
      y - y-axis

  • Method Details

    • initPosition

      public boolean initPosition​(Coordinate pos)
      Initialise the position of the car.
      Parameters:
      pos - Where the car is placed
      Returns:
      False if the car already has a position

    • getCurrentVelocity

      public Velocity getCurrentVelocity()
      Get the current velocity of the car
      Returns:
      Current velocity of the car

    • getMaxVelocity

      public Velocity getMaxVelocity()
      Get the highest reached speed of the car
      Returns:
      Highest reached velocity

    • resetRoute

      public void resetRoute()
      Empties the route of the car

    • getNextBasePoint

      public Coordinate getNextBasePoint()
      Calculates the next base point by vector addition. Velocity and the position are added together.
      Returns:
      Base point where the player lands in the next move

    • getRoute

      public List<Coordinate> getRoute()
      Get the route of the car
      Returns:
      List of coordinates

    • getNumberOfMoves

      public int getNumberOfMoves()
      Get the number of moves the player already has made. The initial placement is subtracted, so only moves count.
      Returns:
      Number of moves done

    • getColor

      public javafx.scene.paint.Color getColor()
      Get the color of the car
      Returns:
      Color of the car

    • setColor

      public void setColor​(javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Set the color of the car
      Parameters:
      color - Color to set

    • resetVelocity

      public void resetVelocity()
      Resets the velocity of the car to zero

    • setVelocity

      public void setVelocity​(Velocity velocity)
      Set the velocity of the car
      Parameters:
      velocity - Velocity of the car

    • updateVelocity

      public void updateVelocity()
      Update the Velocity by subtracting the current position by the previous one.

    • getPosition

      public Coordinate getPosition()
      Get the position of car's current position
      Returns:
      Current Position of the Car

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo​(Coordinate coordinate)
      Move the car to a new Position
      Parameters:
      coordinate - Where to move to

    • getLastPosition

      public Coordinate getLastPosition()
      Get the previous position of the car, if one exists, otherwise it will return the current position.
      Returns:
      Previous position

    • hasCrashed

      public boolean hasCrashed()
      Get the value if the car has crashed
      Returns:
      True if it has crashed, false otherwise

    • setCrashed

      public void setCrashed​(boolean crashed)
      Set crash property
      Parameters:
      crashed - True if it has crashed, false otherwise

    • isOffTrack

      public boolean isOffTrack()
      Check if the car is off track
      Returns:
      True if the car is off-track, false otherwise

    • setOffTrack

      public void setOffTrack​(boolean offTrack)
      Set off-track property
      Parameters:
      offTrack - True if the car is offtrack, false otherwise

    • getValidMoves

      public List<Coordinate> getValidMoves()
      Get an array of neighbour coordinates (index starting top left and ending bottem left) base coordinate included
      Returns:
      An array of neighbour coordinates, with the base coordinate
